content: ata Model | Attribute | Type | Description | | :---------------- | :--------: | :-------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | flightId | `'string'` | Unique flight identifier. A flight may include multiple legs for operations. | | udor | `'date'` | Flightâ€™s date of origination (UTC). | | carrier | `'string'` | Operating carrier code (e.g., TK, XQ). | | flightNumber | `'string'` | Published flight number. | | departureAirport | `'string'` | IATA code of the departure airport. | | arrivalAirport | `'string'` | IATA code of the arrival airport. | | regId | `'string'` | Aircraft registration number. | | direction | `'string'` | Flight direction: Arrival or Departure. | | terminal | `'string'` | Terminal used at the airport. | | checkInCounter | `'string'` | Assigned desk(s) for check-in and baggage drop. | | baggageBelt | `'datetime'` | Assigned baggage claim belt. | | boardingStartDate | `'datetime'` | Actual boarding start time (UTC). | | gate | `'string'` | Assigned boarding gate. | | source | `'string'` | Originating source system of the data: TAV or FRA. | | extraInfo | `'string'` | Extra information |
